shortDescription: This logistical base is a key component of the Capellans' hold on this area of Kern. Any significant force in the region needs this base to remain operational and supplied in the field. The main facility is located in deep woods, well concealed and well defended. Expect heavy resistance before reaching it, and expect turret defenses at the base itself. A secondary base nearby houses technicians and staff; destroying it is not required, but if you manage to, it will ensure the main facility remains permanently closed and unrepairable.
longDescription: This base sounds like a tough nut to crack, Commander. Expect two full lances on the field, plus the turrets. We'd better bring our heaviest 'Mechs.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy Logistical Facility and Extract Safely
contractObjectiveList.description: Destroy Enemy Structures and Extract Safely

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Logistical Facility
objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the targeted buildings.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Base Garrison
objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the garrison / defenders of the base.

objectiveList.title: HIDDEN Objective: Destroy the Base Turrets
Destroy the Capellan Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The objective to eliminate enemy reinforcements who attack.

objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to extract their units.

dialogueContent.words: Commander, the logistical base is just ahead, along the dirt road on your right.
We've marked the critical structures in the facility for you.
There's a Capellan patrol nearby; expect it to join in once the fighting starts.
Reduce the facility to rubble, Commander. We'll be waiting for your report.
That base won't be supplying any Capellan forces any time soon. Well done, Commander.
…Commander, I hate to ruin things with bad news, but we're picking up a new set of contacts closing on the facility. 'Mechs. Big ones.
Damn. Looks like Capellan reinforcements. You'll need to get 'Mechs on the field to deal with them ASAP.
The base defenders will have already signaled to the Liao HQ on Kern. The operation is blown, Commander.
That patrol is on its way in, Commander. Expect contact shortly.
We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
